title: LISTEN: Sunday Supplement podcast - January 14
description: Listen to the latest edition of the Sunday Supplement podcast, with Alexis Sanchez, Antonio Conte and VAR among the topics of discussion.
content: Neil Ashton was joined on the show by Jonathan Northcroft, (Football Correspondent, Sunday Times), Dominic Fifield, (London Football Correspondent, The Guardian) and Charlie Wyett (Football Editor, The Sun).The panel debated Sanchez's future and whether he will leave Arsenal this month to join either Manchester City or Manchester United.There was also talk about whether Chelsea boss Conte will depart in the summer, and who will take over at Stoke.Also discussed were recent reports of racism and bullying in football, VAR, Harry Kane, and Phil Neville managing England Women.Listen to the Sunday Supplement podcast and subscribe to more via iTunes
